title: Ping spikes
body: Hey again, since the past 2 days, I'm getting some high ping spikes. I play LoL in wireless connection because the router is not close to my desktop to connect the ethernet. Just this last 7.12 patch had some weird ping spikes. Any fix to lessen this?

replies.body: You might need to update some of your network settings to get a more solid link to our servers after this latest patch. Double check for any [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) you might be able to fix, test them in a practice/custom game and let me know if it helps.
